Falters at times: The claim falters by stating that Bernie Sanders "opposed Obamacare" when in fact he voted in favor of the law.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to back up the assertion that Bernie Sanders "didn't like the fact we didn't push a single-payer option."
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that opposing Obamacare equates to not liking the fact that a single-payer option was not included, without providing sufficient evidence for this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that Bernie Sanders supported Obamacare but wanted a single-payer option included, which contradicts the claim's assertion that he opposed the law.
